text.blurb: Hello, I am Alex Harris-Jedamski! I am passionate about programming and creating high-quality code using the latest technologies. I have experience working with the React framework, Redux, JavaScript ES6, Express, Axios,  SASS and Flexbox, all of which were used to build this site.
text.extensionOne: I am a motivated and highly educated learner stepping into the world of professional web development. I am loving the process of mastering modern JavaScript ES6 and delving into the fantastic React framework! I always design using a responsive, mobile-first approach with a focus on ease of access. I also have experience working with Bootstrap 4, Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Xd.
text.extensionTwo: I have an extensive academic background, with a combined Bachelor’s degree in business and international studies and a Master’s degree in teaching. My exceptional academic performance, where I achieved a grade point average of 6.69 across all studies (Australian grading - equates to a British 1st), speaks volumes to my ability to learn, perform to deadlines, and submit high quality work.
